user_question: How can I make a traditional French Ratatouille and generate an image of the dish?
final_answer: Traditional French Ratatouille recipe: 1 eggplant, 1 zucchini, 1 bell pepper, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup olive oil, salt, pepper, and herbs de Provence. Image of Ratatouille generated. It is best served warm or at room temperature, often with crusty bread or as a side dish to grilled meats.
